2.title: 2017: Day One - Part 2

7.title: 2017: Day Four - Part 2

imdb.title: Snooker Shoot-Out
plot: Live coverage of the _Snooker Shoot-Out_ (qv) tournament at the Circus Arena in Blackpool, England in which 64 of the world's best players compete for a top prize of £32,000.::Anonymous
